tool_description: The Random Quote Generator API offers daily nuggets of wisdom and inspiration. With a single GET request to /random-quote, access a diverse collection of thought-provoking quotes, complete with author information. Ideal for websites, apps, and chatbots, this API requires no authentication and is completely free. Elevate your project with motivational content effortlessly.
name: Random Quote
title: Random Quote

api_list.name: getSingleQuote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quote8.p.rapidapi.com/random-quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quote8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quote8.p.rapidapi.com/random-quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quote8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
